TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IndexerNameAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates the name by which an indexer is known in programming languages that do not support indexers directly.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can apply this attribute to properties.
This attribute is directly processed by the compiler, and cannot be accessed after compilation through Reflection.
The classes in <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices> are for compiler writers use only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string indexerName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the indexer, as shown to other languages.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
